title: "4 LDA model"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(rfintext)
library(quanteda)
library(topicmodels)
library(topicdoc)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
dtm <- aspol |>
  preprocess_corpus() |>
  corpus_to_dtm(kunta, LEMMA)
```
Optimal values for k are 6 and 15.

```{r}
lda1 <- topicmodels::LDA(quanteda::convert(dtm, to = "tm"), k = 6, control = list(seed = 1234))
lda2 <- topicmodels::LDA(quanteda::convert(dtm, to = "tm"), k = 15, control = list(seed = 1234))
```

```{r}
topic_diagnostics(lda1, dtm)
topic_diagnostics(lda2, dtm)
```

```{r}
terms(lda1, 25)
```

```{r}
terms(lda2, 25)
```
